title: Rishi Sunak
summary: Rishi Sunak (/ˈrɪʃiːˈsuːnæk/, born 12 May 1980) is a British politician who has served as Chancellor of the Exchequer since 2020. A member of the Conservative Party, he was previously Chief Secretary to the Treasury from 2019 to 2020. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Richmond (Yorks) in North Yorkshire since 2015.
